pli-tv-bu-vb-pc78:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc78:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū pesalehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ bhaṇḍanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc78:1.10: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc78:1.11: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṃ bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalahajātānaṃ vivādāpannānaṃ upassutiṃ tiṭṭhissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc78:1.12: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṃ bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalahajātānaṃ vivādāpannānaṃ upassutiṃ tiṭṭhathā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc78:1.15: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, bhikkhūnaṃ bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalahajātānaṃ vivādāpannānaṃ upassutiṃ tiṭṭhissatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc78:1.17: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc78:1.18: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalahajātānaṃ vivādāpannānaṃ upassutiṃ tiṭṭheyya—‘yaṃ ime bhaṇissanti taṃ sossāmī’ti etadeva paccayaṃ karitvā anaññaṃ, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc78:2.1.10: “imesaṃ sutvā codessāmi sāressāmi paṭicodessāmi paṭisāressāmi maṅkū karissāmī”ti gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc78:2.1.12: Pacchato gacchanto turito gacchati sossāmīti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc78:2.1.14: Purato gacchanto ohiyyati sossāmīti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc78:2.1.16: Bhikkhussa ṭhitokāsaṃ vā nisinnokāsaṃ vā nipannokāsaṃ vā āgantvā mantentaṃ ukkāsitabbaṃ, vijānāpetabbaṃ, no ce ukkāseyya vā vijānāpeyya vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc78:2.1.18: na añño koci paccayo hoti upassutiṃ tiṭṭhituṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc78:2.2.1: Upasampanne upasampannasaññī upassutiṃ tiṭṭhati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc78:2.2.2: Upasampanne vematiko upassutiṃ tiṭṭhati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc78:2.2.3: Upasampanne anupasampannasaññī upassutiṃ tiṭṭhati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc78:2.3.2: “imesaṃ sutvā oramissāmi viramissāmi vūpasamissāmi attānaṃ parimocessāmī”ti gacchati,
